column4: rhythmbox will convert other formats to a ipod playable format ?  is that by default ?
yes, but only the copy it actually puts on the iPod, it leaves your music library alone
is that the only application you are aware of that does that ?  for ipod ?
I don't know, I expect gtkpod and amaroK do the same, banshee possibly does as well, but I don't think banshee works with classic/3g nano
